MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Improved graphics and music, 150 new levels

English.Keywords: njam, pac, man, pacman, multiplayer, music, ghost, cookie, dot, pill, button, superpower, free, download, arcade, game, classic
English.Char_Desc_45: Multiplayer pacman with great graphics, music
English.Char_Desc_80: Multiplayer pacman with great graphics, music and over 150 levels to play
English.Char_Desc_250: Pacman clone with single and multiplayer modes: duel and cooperative. Also playable over network. Has great graphics, music and over 150 levels to play. Comes with integrated level editor and joystick/joypad support.
English.Char_Desc_450: Pacman clone with single and multiplayer modes: duel and cooperative. Also playable over network. Has great graphics, music and over 150 levels to play. Comes with integrated level editor and joystick/joypad support.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Pacman clone with single and multiplayer modes: duel and cooperative. Also playable over network. Has great graphics, music and over 150 levels to play. Comes with integrated level editor and joystick/joypad support.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
Trial Version
This trial version enables you to play a limited part of the game in order to evaluate whether you like it and wish to buy it. You are free to use and share this version as long as you want, provided that you don't make any changes to the program or files that come with it.
